Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the impact of the details pointed out by Dick Morris in the 2007 Hillary Clinton campaign ad.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough support for the details mentioned in the 2007 campaign ad.
Falters at times: The claim may falter at times by misrepresenting what Bill Clinton actually said in the video and rebutting claims that were not made.
Problematic assumption: The claim may make a problematic assumption about Hillary Clinton's political aspirations in the 1970s and 1990s.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim may not consider alternative explanations for the details presented in the 2007 campaign ad.
